title: Letter of Credit opened to purchase 300,000 barrels of petrol
body_lines: The People’s Bank has opened a Letter of Credit (LC) for USD 42.6 million to purchase a shipment with 300,000 barrels of Octane 92 Petrol.
Meanwhile, Minister of Power and Energy Kanchana Wijesekara told a media briefing yesterday that petrol volumes can be released to the market by this weekend, it Letters of Credit are opened soon.
